channel.title: Sleeping on Notes from the Wired
channel.description: Recent content in Sleeping on Notes from the Wired

item.title: My Homelab Part 0: Prologue
item.description: Lately, maintaining a consistent sleeping schedule has posed big challenge for me. Different university courses have lead me to wake up on some days as early as 6 a.m., while on other days, I’ve found myself rising as late as 12. p.m . This irregular sleeping schedule has been quite a struggle, especially on days where I had to get up early. My body, accustomed to my late-night schedule, could never fall asleep soon enough for a well-rested morning.
